description: A collection of paragraph style groups.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new ParagraphStyleGroup (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ParagraphStyleGroup.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroups within the specified range.

parameters.description: The ParagraphStyleGroup, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ParagraphStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The ParagraphStyleGroup, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ParagraphStyleGroup, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the ParagraphStyleGroup that follows the desired ParagraphStyleGroup.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup whose index follows the specified ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.

parameters.description: The ParagraphStyleGroup whose index comes before the desired ParagraphStyleGroup.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every ParagraphStyleGroup in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ParagraphStyleGroup.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the ParagraphStyleGroup with the specified index.

name: ParagraphStyleGroups
